name: Etat d'urgence (State of Emergency)
description:
Etat D'Urgence (State of Emergency) is a game about how the state can use the police to stop activists and demonstrations.

Search for activists with your police cars and park at demonstrations to stop the people from expressing theirs ideas.

(Left click : Select police car / Right click : Move to position)

Made in 48 hours at the CRI in Paris for Amnesty International

Game Design & Programming : 
- Rémi Leblanc
- David Birgé-Cotte
Art : 
- Radhika Baumé
Music & Sound Design :
- Aurelien Montero
